document.full_text: about 200 taliban fighters attacked a police outpost in a remote, mountainous region of afghanistan's east on tuesday, police and government officials said, with two insurgents killed during a gunfight lasting several hours.
document.title: two insurgents killed during battle in afghanistan
lines_and_colors: about 200 taliban fighters attacked a police outpost in a remote, mountainous region of afghanistan's east on tuesday, police and government officials said, with two insurgents killed during a gunfight lasting several hours.
